meanings.definition: The state or fact of being present
meanings.sent1: Her presences at the meeting always brought a sense of calm.
meanings.sent2: The presences of the students in the classroom made the teacher happy.
meanings.sent3: The cat's sudden presences in the room startled the dog.
meanings.sent4: The presences of the stars in the night sky filled her with wonder.
meanings.sent5: The presences of the old tree in the garden gave it a magical feel.

meanings.definition: The ability to project a sense of ease and self-assurance
meanings.sent1: His presences on stage captivated the audience with his confidence.
meanings.sent2: The actor's presences in the film made his character believable.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playful presences in the park made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her presences in the office always lifted the team's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The presences of the wise owl in the story inspired the young readers.
